name: HAZLETON AREA SCHOOL DISTRICT et al., Appellants, v. STATE BOARD OF EDUCATION of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania et al., Appellees
name_abbreviation: Hazleton Area School District v. State Board of Education

judges: Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
parties: HAZLETON AREA SCHOOL DISTRICT et al., Appellants, v. STATE BOARD OF EDUCATION of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania et al., Appellees.

opinions.text:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM.
Decree of the Commonwealth Court, 21 Pa.Cmwlth. 547, 347 A.2d 324, is affirmed. Each party to bear own cost.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Philip F. Hudock, James S. Palermo, Anthony J. Ciotola, Hazleton, for appellants.
Norman J. Watkins, Deputy Atty. Gen., for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
364 A.2d 660
HAZLETON AREA SCHOOL DISTRICT et al., Appellants, v. STATE BOARD OF EDUCATION of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania et al., Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued May 3, 1976.
Decided Oct. 20, 1976.
Philip F. Hudock, James S. Palermo, Anthony J. Ciotola, Hazleton, for appellants.
Norman J. Watkins, Deputy Atty. Gen., for appellees.
Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
